cyclone.name: ERIN
cyclone.current_location: about 365 miles SE of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: Drifting southeast now, then forecast to turn north on Wednesday and accelerate northeastward well off the U.S. East Coast toward Atlantic Canada

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Outer Banks of North Carolina north-eastward to Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.wind: Breezy conditions possible; tropical-storm-force winds not expected at the port
weather_observation.rainfall: Scattered outer-band showers could bring light to moderate rain
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents along adjacent Virginia beaches could affect port traffic
